name: versal-runtime
description: Runtime for Versal flavor of custom elements

scripts.test: echo 'run static web server and open test/index.html'
scripts.build: ./node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs polyfills/ecma-promise.js polyfills/html-custom-event.js polyfills/html-template-element.js polyfills/polymer-custom-elements.js polyfills/polymer-html-imports.js -o dist/runtime.min.js --screw-ie8

author: Andrey Mereskin <am@versal.com>
